textBox.richText: I’ve been traveling a lot the last couple weeks. I was lucky enough to tag along on my husband’s business trip to Pisa, Italy with my little girl. It was so exciting for me, and Josie heard lots of “Ciao Bella”. To get back into the swing of things a bit, I am starting by putting up a couple small pages. The first is the Links Regarding the Indonesian Massacres, and the second is the topic page for Indonesian Massacres. I have already put up a page for a Bibliography of the Indonesian Massacres.
